meanings.sent1: The approbated document was displayed proudly on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The approbated decision was met with cheers and smiles.
meanings.sent3: The approbated cake was devoured in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her approbated artwork shone brightly among the others.
meanings.sent5: The approbated award sparkled under the stage lights.

meanings.definition: To express approval or praise for.
meanings.sent1: She approbated the student's hard work with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: The committee approbated the new proposal unanimously.
meanings.sent3: The cat approbated the warm sunbeam by curling up in it.
meanings.sent4: His boss approbated his dedication by promoting him.
meanings.sent5: The audience approbated the performance with a standing ovation.
